scripts.docker:prod: docker rm -f mailermicroservice || true && docker build -t mailermicroservice . && docker run -d -p 8080:8080 -p 8081:8081 --name mailermicroservice mailermicroservice
scripts.docker:dev: docker rm -f mailermicroservice || true && docker build -t mailermicroservice . && docker run -d -p 8080:8080 -p 8081:8081 -e ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development --name mailermicroservice mailermicroservice
